title: Jar, mid- 18th–late 18th century
description: Ovoid form with rounded lip; "Sang de Boeuf" or oxblood glaze running to foot where it was ground away. "Celadon" glaze inside and over lip where it flows with red. Also "celadon" glaze in poorly finished foot. Firing crack at neck.

tombstone.epitaph:
Jar, mid- 18th–late 18th century.
mid- 18th–late 18th century. Glazed porcelain. Gift of Anonymous Donor. 1967-48-118-a,b.
